subject: Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Beloved!

I was led to you by my spirit and I thank God Almighty that I found you.

I am Reverend Sister Myleen Duterte currently serving at Our Lady of
Remedies Catholic Church Manila, Philippines. I am 68 years old and I have
been suffering from Pancreatic Exocrine Cancer for the past 3 years. I was
told by my doctor that my health condition has worsened with need to embark
on a surgical operation at Johns Hopkins Health Baltimore Maryland, USA.
But my doctor has advised me not to undergo the surgical operation because
my chances of survival is very slim and this has left me in a state of
despair. Worst is, I don't have a child of my own due to my Catholic faith
which did not permit me to marry.

Due to my dying condition, I have promised God that I will spend all my
life savings and inheritance on the less privileged and this is where I
will be needing your help. I am willing to will all my fund to you which is
about $6,150,000.00 ( Six Million, One Hundred and Fifty Thousand US
Dollars). You will be permitted to take 45% of the fund for your family and
personal use. The remaining 55% will be strictly for charity. I wish that
you set up a foundation in your country under my name to serve as my
memorial when I'm gone.

This cash is deposited in a secured bank in the Philippines and I have
informed my lawyer appropriately about my decision to Will this fund to
you.  Kindly get back to me immediately with the information below through
my private email (revmyleenduterte@gmail.com) if you are interested in
carrying out this task on my behalf:


Your full name...........
Your mobile number............
Your age.......................
Your sex...........................
Your identification proof....................
Your occupation.................... ...........
Your country and city.......................


NB: I will appreciate your confidentiality and trust in a bid to accomplish
my heart's desire, as I don't want anything that will jeopardize my last
wish.

God bless you.
Reverend Sister Myleen Duterte

subject: Re: Hello Beloved!
body:
Hello Reverend Sister Myleen Duterte,

I appreciate you reaching out to me with your story. It's truly touching to hear about your selfless desire to help the less privileged despite facing such a challenging health condition. I'm interested in learning more about how I can assist you in fulfilling your last wish.

Could you please provide me with more details on how we can proceed with this noble cause? I would like to understand the steps involved and how I can ensure that your wishes are carried out appropriately.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Harry
